document.full_text: an amur leopard injured a seven-year-old boy at the zoo in wichita, kansas on friday after the boy climbed over an outer barrier and got next to the animal's cage.
document.title: zoo leopard injures boy who gets next to cage
lines_and_colors: an amur leopard injured a seven-year-old boy at the zoo in wichita, kansas on friday after the boy climbed over an outer barrier and got next to the animal's cage.
